entries.label: Dadra & Nagar Haveli and Daman & Diu
Ministry Of Social Justice and Empowerment
Ministry Of Agriculture and Farmers Welfare
Ministry Of Micro, Small and Medium Enterprises
Ministry of Fisheries,Animal Husbandry and Dairying
Ministry Of New and Renewable Energy
Ministry of Electronics and Information Technology
Ministry of Women and Child Development
Ministry Of Skill Development And Entrepreneurship
Ministry Of Personnel, Public Grievances And Pensions
Ministry Of Petroleum and Natural Gas
Comptroller And Auditor General Of India
Ministry Of Environment,forests and climate change
Ministry Of Consumer Affairs, Food And Public Distribution
Ministry Of Development Of North Eastern Region
Ministry Of Statistics and Programme Implementation
NITI Aayog (National Institution for Transforming India)

fields.schemeName: Integrated Social Security Scheme - Old Age Pension
fields.briefDescription: ISSS-OAP is a State Sponsored Scheme by the Social Welfare Dept. of the Govt. of Jammu and Kashmir wherein financial assistance is provided to Old Age Persons who have meager support or no source of livelihood. A pension of ₹1000 per pensioner per month is deposited directly into their Bank Account.

fields.schemeName: Nirman Shramik Safety Kit Yojana
fields.briefDescription: "Nirman Shramik Safety Kit Yojana" is a scheme by the Department of Labour, Employment, Training & Skill Development Govt of Jharkhand. The scheme provides a direct cash transfer of ₹ 1,000/- for purchasing a branded helmet and a pair of safety shoes.

fields.schemeName: Startup Manipur
fields.briefDescription: The state government of Manipur has introduced the 'Startup Manipur' initiative, aimed at promoting sustainable economic development and generating significant employment opportunities in the region.

fields.schemeName: Stipend For Girls Of Secondary Students Schemes
fields.briefDescription: The Nagaland Stipend for Girls of Secondary Students scheme is a scholarship program launched by the Government of Nagaland with the aim of promoting and encouraging girl students to continue their education beyond the secondary level.

fields.schemeName: Chief Ministergi Artistessingi Tengbang - Assistance To The Cultural Group For Training With New Production
fields.briefDescription: "CMAT - Assistance to the Cultural Group for Training with New Production" by the Dept. of Art and Culture, Govt. of Manipur aims at providing financial assistance to registered cultural groups that have been relentlessly working on providing training to the younger generation with new products.

fields.schemeName: Opening And Running Junior Colleges For VJNT Students Run By Voluntary Agencies
fields.briefDescription: The Govt. of Maharashtra vide G.R. dated 26/6/2008 launched the scheme “Opening and Running Junior Colleges for VJNT Students Run by Voluntary Agencies” for the educational and social development of Vimukta Jatis and Nomadic Tribes (VJNT) students.

fields.schemeName: Subsidy Scheme For Purchase Of Taxi / Goods Vehicle / Passenger Autorickshaw
fields.briefDescription: Those beneficiaries who are sanctioned / approved for loan from the Banks for the purchase of Passenger Autorickshaw / Goods Vehicle / Taxi will be provided a subsidy of 33% of the value of the vehicle or a maximum subsidy of Rs. 2.5 Lakhs. Women will be given priority. Women will be given priority.

fields.schemeName: Deen Dayal Upadhyaya Bunkar Yojana
fields.briefDescription: DDUBY is a government initiative in Arunachal Pradesh to provide affordable credit to women weavers, offering an interest subvention of 7% on short-term loans and working capital requirements.

fields.schemeName: Udyogini Scheme
fields.briefDescription: Udyogini is an innovative scheme to assist women in gaining self-reliance and economic independence through self-employment, mainly through trade and the service sector. It also provides for a subsidy on loans for undertaking business activities/ micro enterprises through banks, etc.

fields.schemeName: Assistance Scheme For Reimbursement For Expenditure On Visa By Construction Workers For Employment Abroad
fields.briefDescription: This scheme will be called "Reimbursement of expenditure incurred on visa for employment abroad to construction workers". The purpose of this scheme is to provide assistance to the registered beneficiaries employed in building and other construction works for better employment opportunities.

fields.schemeName: Delhi Family Benefit Scheme
fields.briefDescription: Family Benefit Scheme (NFBS) to assist those Below Poverty Line (BPL) families whose alone bread earner expires due to natural or accidental causes.

fields.nodalMinistryName: Ministry Of Social Justice and Empowerment
fields.schemeName: National Awards For Outstanding Services In The Field Of Prevention Of Alcoholism And Substance (Drug) Abuse: Outstanding Achievement By An Individual
fields.briefDescription: To recognize the efforts, and, encourage excellence in the Prevention of Alcoholism and Substance (Drugs) Abuse and the rehabilitation of its victims, awards will be presented for the most effective or outstanding services in the prevention of Alcoholism and Substance (Drug) Abuse.

fields.schemeName: Dalit Bandhu
fields.briefDescription: The Dalit Bandhu Scheme is a welfare program launched by the state government of Telangana in India in Aug'2021. The scheme is aimed at providing financial assistance to families belonging to the Scheduled Caste (SC) community in the state to help them become economically self-reliant.

fields.schemeName: AASRA Scheme
fields.briefDescription: The scheme “AASRA Scheme” was launched by the Department of Social Welfare, Government of Jammu & Kashmir in 2015 to provide Social Security cover to widows, Destitute, Below Poverty Line families and Breadwinners of such families whose annual income is less than ₹75000/-.

fields.schemeName: State Research Scholarship
fields.briefDescription: This scholarship is specially designed for students who are pursuing research work. Under the scheme, beneficiaries will get cash awards to conduct their research work.

fields.schemeName: Partial Travel Support Scheme
fields.briefDescription: The Himachal Pradesh Council for Science, Technology & Environment (HIMCOSTE), has a scheme for providing partial travel assistance to deserving bright young Scientists and Research Scholars working in state

fields.schemeName: Schedule Tribe Pre-Metric Scholarship Class 06 To 08
fields.briefDescription: In the year 1984, Rajasthan Government started a scholarship to encourage the education of the Schedule Tribe.

fields.schemeName: Uttam Pashu Puraskar Yojana
fields.briefDescription: The scheme “Uttam Pashu Puraskar Yojana” was launched by the Department of Animal Husbandry, Government of Himachal Pradesh to provide incentives and encouragement to livestock Owners for rearing good quality high yielding animals.

fields.nodalMinistryName: Ministry Of Personnel, Public Grievances And Pensions
fields.schemeName: Domestic Funding Of Foreign Training
fields.briefDescription: The scheme "Domestic Funding of Foreign Training (DFFT)" is a scheme introduced by the Department of Personnel and Training, Government of India in the year 2001-02 with an objective to upgrade the knowledge & skills of Government officers.

fields.schemeName: Krishak Durghatna Kalyan Yojana
fields.briefDescription: The government will provide compensation to the farmers after any accident.

fields.schemeName: Devnarayan Scooty Distribution And Incentive Scheme
fields.briefDescription: The Government of Rajasthan has launched the Devnarayan Chatra Scooty Yojana Scheme for the year 2023 in order to encourage female students in the state to study and to address the state’s low female literacy rate.

fields.schemeName: Vikramaditya Yojna
fields.briefDescription: The Department of Higher Education, Government of Madhya Pradesh has created this new scholarship scheme available for candidates belonging to the General categories.

fields.schemeName: Schemes Of HP Minorities Finance & Development Corporation
fields.briefDescription: Social, educational and economic upliftment of the minority class people living below the poverty line of the state.

fields.schemeName: Arun Pig Development Scheme
fields.briefDescription: The scheme “Arun Pig Development Scheme” was launched by the Department of Animal Husbandry, Veterinary & Dairy Development, Government of Arunachal Pradesh in the financial year 2019-20 with a focus on pig rearing.

fields.nodalMinistryName: Ministry Of Agriculture and Farmers Welfare
fields.schemeName: RKVY Soil Health and Fertility Village level Soil Testing Lab
fields.briefDescription: In order to promote soil test analysis in a campaign mode and to create awareness among farmers about soil health for judicious use of chemical fertilisers, organic manure, the component of “Setting of Village-level Soil Testing Laboratories” is being implemented under the scheme.

fields.schemeName: NEC Stipend And Book Grant Scheme
fields.briefDescription: This scholarship scheme is offered to the students pursuing higher professional courses and belongs to ST and general category. Only Nagaland domiciled candidates will be eligible to apply for this scheme.

fields.schemeName: Mukhyamantri Yuba Yogajog Yojana In Tripura
fields.briefDescription: Financial grant to degree year students for smartphone. Grant Amount = Invoice Amount upto Max. Rs 5000/-

fields.schemeName: Biotechnology Young Entrepreneur Award
fields.briefDescription: The “Biotechnology Young Entrepreneur Award (BYE)” is a programme to promote commercialisation of bioscience ideas among graduate/post graduate students in Biotechnology and to encourage them to develop biotechnology entrepreneurship.

fields.schemeName: Subsidy Scheme For Establishment Of Goat Unit (10+1) For General Category People
fields.briefDescription: The scheme “Subsidy Scheme for Establishment of Goat Unit (10+1) for General Category People” was launched by the Department of Agriculture, Farmers Welfare & Co-operation, Government of Gujarat to uplift Economically poor livestock breeders of Gujarat State.

fields.schemeName: Tripura Industrial Investment Promotion Incentive
fields.briefDescription: The TIPII scheme aims to attract and promote industrial investments in Tripura by providing various incentives and support to eligible businesses, fostering economic growth and job creation in the state.

fields.schemeName: Overseas Visiting Doctoral Fellowship
fields.briefDescription: The objective of the scheme is to build national capacity in frontier areas of Science and Engineering, which are of interest to India by providing research training to PhD students admitted in the Indian institutions in overseas universities / institutions of repute.

fields.schemeName: Pratibha Kiran Scholarship
fields.briefDescription: Pratibha Kiran Scholarship has been launched by the Government of Madhya Pradesh. Through this scheme, scholarship will be provided every year to girl students living below the poverty line.

fields.nodalMinistryName: Ministry Of Micro, Small and Medium Enterprises
fields.schemeName: Testing Fee Reimbursement Scheme
fields.briefDescription: Testing Fee Reimbursement Scheme for Scheduled Caste / Scheduled Tribe is a sub scheme under National Scheduled Caste and Scheduled Tribe Hub (NSSH) scheme.

fields.schemeName: Thakur Sen Negi Utkrisht Chatravriti Yojana
fields.briefDescription: The objective of this scheme is to provide scholarships of ₹11,000/-per annum to the top 100 Girls and top 100 Boys students belonging to the Tribal Community of Himachal Pradesh who have passed Class 10th and presently studying in a recognized institution within or outside the State.

fields.schemeName: Sruthitharangam ( Cochlear Implantation Scheme )
fields.briefDescription: The Govt. of Kerala launched the “Sruthitharangam (Cochlear Implantation Scheme)” under Kerala Social Security Mission by the Social Justice Department, Kerala. This scheme envisioned providing free cochlear implantation surgery for children in the age group of 0-5 years, who are hearing impaired.

fields.nodalMinistryName: Ministry Of Social Justice and Empowerment
fields.schemeName: National Fellowship for Students with Disabilities
fields.briefDescription: A Scheme "National Fellowship For Students With Disabilities" was initiated by the Department of Empowerment of Persons with Disabilities under the "Ministry of Social Justice and Empowerment".

fields.schemeName: Chief Minister’s Yuva Kaushal Yojana
fields.briefDescription: The scheme “Chief Minister’s Yuva Kaushal Yojana (CM YKY)” was launched by the government of Arunachal Pradesh on 1st April 2018 to provide high-end training to the youth across the state to enable them to find jobs in the private sector.

fields.schemeName: Scheme for Plantation Development (New planting & Replanting) under Medium Term Framework Plan (MTFP) in Traditional Areas (Kerala and Tamil Nadu), Non-Traditional and North Eastern Region
fields.briefDescription: The Scheme is intended to increase the production of natural rubber in India by accelerating new planting and replanting of rubber on scientific lines. Accelerated new planting/replanting would be achieved by giving proper technical guidance and financial assistance to growers.

fields.nodalMinistryName: Ministry Of Micro, Small and Medium Enterprises
fields.schemeName: International Cooperation Scheme- Capacity Building of First Time MSE Exporters
fields.briefDescription: The scheme “International Cooperation Scheme” was launched by the MSME, Govt. of India with the aim to capacity build MSMEs for entering export market by providing reimbursement of various costs incurred by first time MSE exporters on export shipments.

fields.schemeName: Vishesh Shiksha Sahaayata Yojana
fields.briefDescription: Chhattisgarh State Government started a scheme "Vishesh Shiksha Sahaayata Yojana" for Building and other construction worker on 10 July 2018.

fields.schemeName: Palanhar Scheme
fields.briefDescription: Palanhar Yojana has been started by the state government of Rajasthan to benefit the orphan and needy children of the state.

fields.schemeName: Medhavi Chhatr/Chhatra Shiksha Protsahan Yojana
fields.briefDescription: Chhattisgarh state Government started a scheme "Medhavi Chhatr/ Chhatra Shiksha Protsahan Yojana" for education.

fields.schemeName: Stipend Scheme For Poultry Farming Training For Schedule Caste
fields.briefDescription: The scheme “Stipend Scheme for Poultry Farming Training for Schedule Caste” was launched by the Department of Agriculture, Farmers Welfare & Co-operation, Government of Gujarat to raise the income of poultry farmers of Scheduled Caste by scientific poultry farming training.

fields.schemeName: Capital Investment Subsidy Scheme for Goan Diaspora
fields.briefDescription: Launched in 2018, "Capital Investment Subsidy Scheme for Goan Diaspora" is one of the "IT Policy Schemes" by the Dept of IT, Govt of Goa. All New Units developing office spaces will be eligible for a capital investment subsidy upto 20% on the capital investments made during the tenure of the Scheme.

fields.schemeName: Technical Education Scholarship Scheme for ITI Level
fields.briefDescription: The objective of the scheme is to improve the quality of training by attracting promising trainees belonging to Scheduled Caste, Scheduled Tribe & Other Backward Classes & popularize technical training among these categories, so as to make them able to earn their livelihood respectably & honorably.

fields.schemeName: Mukhyamantri Nirmaan Shramik Dirghayu Sahayata Yojana
fields.briefDescription: Chhattisgarh State Government started a scheme "Mukhyamantri Nirmaan Shramik Dirghayu Sahayata Yojana" for Building and other construction worker on 11 January 2012.

fields.schemeName: Punjab Farm Tourism Scheme
fields.briefDescription: The scheme envisages to provide to the tourists a clean, hygienic and comfortable stay in the farm houses spread across the State of Punjab. The scheme also aims to provide cultural experience to the domestic and foreign tourists through their exposure to village life.

fields.schemeName: Entrepreneur Support Scheme
fields.briefDescription: Entrepreneur Support Scheme (ESS) is the most popular & attractive scheme operated by the Directorate of Industries and Commerce.The scheme aims to provide financial assistance to Micro,Small&Medium Enterprises engaged in manufacturing activities in the State,proportional to capital investment made.

fields.schemeName: AICTE-National Initiative for Training of Technical Teachers (for Inductee Teachers) Scheme
fields.briefDescription: Ministry of Human Resource Development (MHRD) and All India Council for Technical Education (AICTE) jointly proposed an initiative called “National Initiative for Technical Teachers Training (NITTT)” to address the technical teachers of the country who plays an active role in the technical education

fields.schemeName: National Scheme of Apprenticeship Training
fields.briefDescription: The primary goal of this scheme is to bridge the gap in practical experience for fresh Graduate Engineers, Diploma holders, and 10+2 Vocational pass-outs in approximately 10,000 industrial establishments. The apprentices undergo a one-year training period, receiving a monthly stipend.

fields.schemeName: Central Sector Scheme for Rehabilitation of Bonded Labourer
fields.briefDescription: The scheme addresses eradicating bonded labour in India. It introduces varying rehabilitation assistance amounts based on beneficiary categories, such as adults, children, women, and extreme cases, with provisions for annuity schemes and Direct Benefit Transfer.

fields.schemeName: Atal Pension Yojana
fields.briefDescription: Atal Pension Yojana (APY) is an old age income security scheme for a  savings account holder  in the age group of 18-40 years,  who is not an income tax-payee. It helps to address longevity risks among  workers in unorganized sector and encourages the workers to voluntarily save for retirement.

fields.nodalMinistryName: Ministry Of Social Justice and Empowerment
fields.schemeName: Loan Based Schemes For Safai Karamchari - Education Loan Scheme (ELS)
fields.briefDescription: an Education Loan scheme by the Ministry of Social justice and Empowerment for Safai Karamchari, Manual Scavengers, and their dependants aged 18 years and above.

fields.schemeName: Grama Jyothi
fields.briefDescription: Grama Jyothi is aimed at empowering and improving the standard of living in rural areas through the implementation of various development activities and infrastructure projects. The program focuses on providing basic amenities and services, such as drinking water, sanitation facilities, healthcare.

fields.schemeName: Asangathita Shramik Sahayika Prakalpa
fields.briefDescription: The Asanghatita Shramik Sahayika Prakalpa (ASSP), a state scheme for the social security of  unorganised workers, has been implemented in Tripura since 2003

fields.schemeName: Samruddhi Scheme
fields.briefDescription: Samruddhi scheme is an initiative from the Social Welfare Department of Government of Karnataka. It serves as an enabler to the socially disadvantaged youth and women to take up entrepreneurial activities and promote self-employment.

fields.schemeName: Scheme For Assistance For Start Ups/ Innovation
fields.briefDescription: The "Scheme for Assistance for Startups / Innovation" has been introduced to encourage R&D and start innovation and entrepreneurship at different levels of the startup cycle. The scheme came into force on 07/08/2020 and will remain in operation for a period of 5 years, i.e. upto 06.08.2025.

fields.schemeName: Nishaktata Pension Yojana (JBOCWWB)
fields.briefDescription: "Nishaktata Pension Yojana (JBOCWWB)" is a scheme by the Department of Labour, Employment, Training & Skill Development Govt of Jharkhand. The scheme provides a pension of ₹ 1,000/- per month to the registered beneficiary who is permanently disabled due to paralysis/leprosy/tuberculosis/accident.

fields.schemeName: AICTE - YOUTH UNDERTAKING VISIT FOR ACQUIRING KNOWLEDGE (YUVAK): STUDY TOUR OF ATAL TUNNEL, HIMACHAL PRADESH
fields.briefDescription:
The scheme is intended for providing Financial Grant for conducting a Study Tour of ATAL TUNNEL
by Students / faculty of AICTE approved Institutions in the field of technical education.

fields.schemeName: AICTE SHORT TERM TRAINING PROGRAMME-SFURTI SCHEME
fields.briefDescription: Short Term Training Programme-SFURTI Program aims to provide financial assistance from AICTE to the institutions for conducting faculty and student trainings to enable faculty members and students in the field of technical education.

fields.schemeName: Rajbhasha Gaurav Puraskar Scheme for writing original book in Hindi
fields.briefDescription: The scheme “Rajbhasha Gaurav Puraskar Scheme for writing original book in Hindi” was launched by the Department of Official Language, Ministry of Home Affairs, Government of India with an objective to encourage writing books originally in Hindi and to promote Official Language.

fields.schemeName: Widow Pension (CBOCWWB)
fields.briefDescription: Under this scheme, financial assistance in the form of a monthly pension shall be given to the widows of male registered construction workers of the Board.

fields.schemeName: Awasiya Vidyala Yojana
fields.briefDescription: "Awasiye Vidyala Yojana" initiated by the Labor Department of the Uttar Pradesh State for the education of the construction worker.

fields.schemeName: Grant of Subsidy for Purchase of Mangalyam to the Bridegroom of Weaker Section
fields.briefDescription: The scheme “Grant of Subsidy for Purchase of Mangalyam to the Bridegroom of Weaker Section” by the Dept of Women & Child Development, Govt of Pondicherry, was introduced to provide Financial Assistance of ₹ 2,500/- to the Bridegroom from Weaker Section.

fields.schemeName: Award of Pre-matric Scholarship to the Students Whose Parents Are Engaged in Unclean Occupation
fields.briefDescription: "Award of Pre-matric Scholarship to the Students Whose Parents Are Engaged in Unclean Occupation” by the Adi Dravidar Welfare Dept, Govt of Puducherry, provides scholarships to the students whose parents are engaged in unclean occupations to improve the status of the unprivileged society.

fields.schemeName: Educational Assistance (A.B.O.C.W.W.B)
fields.briefDescription: The “Educational Assistance” scheme was started by the Assam Building and Other Construction Workers Welfare Board, Labour Welfare Department, Government of Assam to provide educational assistance to the children of the registered construction workers who are studying in Class I to Post Graduate.

fields.schemeName: Medical Assistance (A.B.O.C.W.W.B)
fields.briefDescription: Medical assistance shall be provided to Building & Other Construction Workers who are registered under A.B.O.C.W.W.B. during hospitalization, partial disability & for critical diseases such as Cancer, Heart attack, Failure of kidney, Liver cirrhosis etc. as per the decision of the Board.

fields.schemeName: AICTE e-Shodh Sindhu Scheme (eSS)
fields.briefDescription:
AICTE e-Shodh Sindhu Scheme (eSS) provides subscriptions of e-Resources like Web of Science, Scopus,
ASME, ASCE and Bentham Science to institutions.

fields.schemeName: Assistance under SC/ST Prevention of Atrocities Act
fields.briefDescription: The scheme “Assistance under SC/ST Prevention of Atrocities Act” was introduced by the Adi Dravidar Welfare Department, Government of Puducherry. The objective of the scheme is to provide immediate relief to the victims of atrocities who are from Scheduled Castes/ Scheduled Tribes.

fields.schemeName: Financial Assistance to Poor Scheduled Caste People Suffering From Prolonged Diseases
fields.briefDescription: The scheme “Financial Assistance to Poor Scheduled Caste People Suffering From Prolonged Diseases” was introduced by the Adi Dravidar Welfare Dept, Govt of Puducherry. The objective of the scheme is to assist poor patients from Scheduled Castes suffering from prolonged illness.

fields.schemeName: Nirmaan Kamgar Mrtyu Va Divyangta Sahayta Yojana
fields.briefDescription: The "Nirman Kamgar Mrtyu Va Divyangta Sahayta Yojana " is a scheme by the government of Uttar Pradesh, to provide financial assistance to registered construction workers.

fields.schemeName: Scheme Of Coaching & Allied For Scheduled Tribes
fields.briefDescription: Scheme Of Coaching & Allied For Scheduled Tribe aims to provide support for the betterment of Scheduled Tribe (ST) candidates for coaching and pre examination training in quality coaching institutions to enable them to appear in competitive examinations.

fields.schemeName: SERB - POWER Research Grants
fields.briefDescription: The aim of the ‘SERB - POWER Research Grants’ is to encourage emerging and eminent women researchers for individual-centric and competitive mode of research funding to undertake R&D activities in frontier areas of science and engineering.

fields.schemeName: Home for Visually Challenged Person
fields.briefDescription: The scheme “Home for Visually challenged Person" was launched by the Department of Social Welfare, Government of Puducherry. The objective of this scheme is to take care of the male persons who are visually impaired and who lack care and protection in society and are deprived of basic needs.

fields.schemeName: Issue of Free Bus Pass to Differently Abled Person
fields.briefDescription: The scheme “Issue of Free Bus Pass to Differently Abled Person” was launched by the Department of Social Welfare, Government of Puducherry. The scheme provides free bus passes to all the differently abled persons to facilitate their mobility/transport in buses run by the Government and NGOs.

fields.schemeName: Development and Maintenance of Orchard Cum Horti Nurseries
fields.briefDescription: The scheme has been launched for the production and multiplication of good, high-yielding, diseased free planting materials in the Government farms for distribution to farmers through the District Horticulture Officer.

fields.schemeName: Disability Pension (A.B.O.C.W.W.B)
fields.briefDescription: The Board provides financial assistance as disability pension to a beneficiary who is permanently disabled due to paralysis leprosy, TB., accident etc. in addition to this pension he/she will be eligible for an one time Ex-gratia payment depending upon the percentage of disability.

fields.schemeName: Technology Development Fund (TDF) Scheme
fields.briefDescription: Technology Development Fund (TDF) has been established to promote self-reliance in Defence Technology as a part of the 'Make in India' initiative.

fields.schemeName: Incentive For Eye Donors
fields.briefDescription: The scheme “Incentive For Eye Donors” by the Department of Social Welfare, Government of Puducherry was introduced to create awareness among the public about the eye donation and to pay an amount of incentive to the donors of eye. In this scheme, an amount ₹ 10,000/- per beneficiary is provided.

fields.schemeName: Mukhya mantri Krishak Udyami Yojana
fields.briefDescription: The objective of this scheme is to provide financial assistance to the sons and daughters of farmers to establish their businesses. the government of Madhya Pradesh provided loans to the bank for all citizens of the state.

fields.schemeName: Prime Minister’s Scholarship Scheme for the Wards of States/UTs Police Personnel
fields.briefDescription: The scheme was introduced by the Ministry of Home Affairs, Government of India from the academic session 2019-20 to encourage higher technical & professional education for the dependent wards of States/UTs Police Personnel who are martyred during Terror/Naxal attacks.

fields.schemeName: National Grassroots Innovation and Outstanding Traditional Knowledge Awards
fields.briefDescription: National Innovation Foundation (NIF)-India, an autonomous body of the Department of Science and Technology, Government of India, invites entries of unaided technological innovations and traditional knowledge developed at grassroots by an individual (Citizen of India) or group.

fields.schemeName: Rashtriya Vigyan Puraskar
fields.briefDescription: The objective of the Rashtriya Vigyan Puraskar (RVP) is to recognise the notable and inspiring contribution made by the scientists, technologists and innovators individually or in teams in various fields of science, technology and technology- led innovation.

fields.schemeName: Fruit Processing Centre
fields.briefDescription: The objective of scheme is to disseminate technical knowhow to youth entrepreneurs, farmers & housewives through practical demonstration on importance of fruit preservation & to manufacture quality processed fruit products such as Squashes, Jams, Jelly & Juices under trade name ‘Meg Fruits Product'.

fields.schemeName: Integrated Technology Enabled Agriculture Management System Or iTEAMS
fields.briefDescription: The scheme was launched by the Department of Agriculture & Farmers’ Welfare, Govt. of Meghalaya to address critical issues of enabling & facilitating access to remunerative & sustainable markets for farmers produce in most transparent & effective manner through facilitation service iTEAM Dial 1917.

fields.schemeName: Day Care - cum - Recreation Centre and Physiotherapy Unit
fields.briefDescription: Through the scheme “Day Care - cum - Recreation Centre and Physiotherapy Unit" under "Grant-in-Aid to Pondicherry Society for the Care of the Aged (PONCARE)", the senior citizens are provided free physiotherapy given by the physiotherapist, as advised by the doctors.

fields.schemeShortTitle: CHIEF MINISTER AGRICULTURE AND FOOD PROCESSING SCHEME
fields.schemeName: Chief Minister Agriculture and Food Processing Scheme
fields.briefDescription: to encourage model technology based projects and quality enhancement of agriculture produce, to encourage exports, to create skill manpower for agro and food processing and employment generation through small and medium agro and food processing units in rural areas.

fields.schemeName: Grant-in-aid to Non-governmental Organisations
fields.briefDescription: The scheme “Grant-in-aid to Non-governmental Organisations" was launched by the Department of Social Welfare, Government of Puducherry. The objective of this scheme is to cover 90% of estimated maintenance cost for the registered NGOs running residential homes for children, aged, and vulnerable.....

fields.schemeName: Assistance to Scheduled Caste Farmers for Installation of Submersible / Centrifugal Motor Pumpsets With Accessories
fields.briefDescription: Through this scheme, the farmers from the Scheduled Caste Category are provided with a grant of 90% subsidy towards the installation of suitable Submersible / Centrifugal motor pump sets with accessories, subject to a maximum of ₹60,000/‐ per tubewell per individual.

fields.schemeName: State Technical Scholarship for ST Student
fields.briefDescription: The financial assistance is provided to students of Scheduled Tribe Communities who are pursuing Diploma/ Degree/Post Graduated/course in Engineering Institutes recognized by All India Council for Technical Education and, also provided to students who are pursuing UG or PG in Forestry courses.

fields.schemeName: Agriculture Engineering (Mechanical) Scheme
fields.briefDescription: The objective of the scheme is to provide agricultural machinery such as power tillers/ bulldozers/ tractors etc. on hiring at subsidised rate.

fields.schemeName: Ramie Crop Scheme
fields.briefDescription: The objective of the scheme is to encourage cultivation of perennial and remunerative textile crop such as Ramie in suitable areas by providing necessary inputs and training.

fields.schemeName: Honorarium for Pradhan Samajpatis of Indigenous Tribal Community
fields.briefDescription: “Honorarium for Pradhan Samajpatis of Indigenous Tribal Community" was launched by the Directorate of Social Welfare and Social Education, Govt. of Tripura on 1st July 2021 to provide financial assistance to to the Pradhan Samajpatis (Chief Community Headman) of indigenous tribal community.

fields.schemeName: Mukhyamantri Samajik Sahayata Prakalpa - Unorganized Workers
fields.briefDescription: The scheme “Mukhyamantri Samajik Sahayata Prakalpa-Unorganized Workers" was launched by the Directorate of Social Welfare and Social Education, Government of Tripura. The objective of this scheme is to provide financial benefits to Unorganized Workers (home-based, self-employed or wage workers).

fields.schemeName: Samagra Samajik Suraksha Parityakta Pension Yojana
fields.briefDescription: Under the Scheme, Madhya Pradesh government provides financial benefits to Be from a family living below the poverty line.

fields.schemeName: Shubhshakti Yojana
fields.briefDescription: The Shubshakti Yojana has been initiated by the Rajasthan government with the aim of providing financial assistance to regular construction workers, unmarried laborers, and their daughters.

fields.schemeName: ICRO Amrit Internship Programme
fields.briefDescription: The IPL Centre for Rural Outreach (ICRO) has launched ICRO Amrit Internship Programme focused on youth productivity for prosperity. The interns will be placed at the headquarters and Regional Offices of NPC/ IPL. The duration of the internship will be 3 months initially, renewable up to four times.

fields.schemeName: "Input Assistance to Farmers for Taking up Fish Farming in Farm Ponds" Component of the "Mukhyamantri Maschyajibi Kalyan Yojana" Scheme
fields.briefDescription: The objective of this scheme is to increase the inland fish production, and to enhance the income of farmers in the State though aquaculture. Input assistance is provided to the farmers who have excavated farm ponds under MGNREGA for facilitating the production of fingerling and fish.

fields.schemeName: Plant Protection including Integrated Pest Management Scheme
fields.briefDescription: The objective of the scheme is to mobilize and support farmers to use bio-pesticides and bio- agents for plant health management through distribution of bio-pesticides and other IPM tools and through sale of Sprayers and Plant Protection Equipment to encourage organic crop production.

fields.schemeName: "In-Plant Training" Component of the "Development of Industries" Scheme
fields.briefDescription: "In-Plant Training" was introduced to create employment opportunities and motivate entrepreneurship among the educated unemployed youth. The trainees acquire the skill by observing, assisting and learning the job on their own in the plant itself, making them acquire better skills in the trade.
